title: Problem of Log in (OCE)

replies.body:
Your network might be getting blocked from accessing the authentication server.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to see if auto-configuring your firewall settings help.

Otherwise, hop into a custom and try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix that up.
